title: DirtySixer tease 36er AllRoad Mark II bike for the tallest riders (up to 7′ 6″)
content:
DirtySixer is updating their 36″ wheel AllRoad commuter bike for extra tall people through to extra, extra, extra, extra, extra tall people. Now Mark II, the 36er will shortly be available in sizes XL-5XL with a whopping pre-order discount of $2000 USD. Past customers of the DirtySixer AllRoad include LeBron James, Mark Eaton, Kevin Durant,

The post DirtySixer tease 36er AllRoad Mark II bike for the tallest riders (up to 7′ 6″) appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
